name: Six Crush-jean theme
description:
Game Description: A more challenging hexagonal eliminate game make people can't stop.

Game Features: It is an easy to understand and master the simple puzzle games,unique style of light cowboy theme style,more test your powers of observation and space conception，as it were the full version of puzzle addictive.There are high score list,waiting for you to go beyond!

Playing Method: There is a large hexagon in the main interface to eliminate checkerboard,three groups arises each random hexagon squares,drag one of the group on the board blanks,make arrangement to complete one or more lines,eliminate scores can be realized.When the board can no longer be put under any combination of a hexagon,game over.
